author: nmalin
msg: restore element parameter, auto-parameters-entity and auto-parameters-service removed by error at revision r1650821

author: pderop
msg: When the bundle is being stopped and when the component is using a parallel executor, then don't deactivate the component asynchronously because
we want to make sure that the bundle context is not invalidated at the time the component is stopped (removed).
So far, we were using a blocking latch, but blocking the current thread is something we should avoid at all.
Now, we don't use anymore a blocking latch and we just invoke the DispatchExecutor.execute method with a special flag that make sure
that the stop task is not dispatched in the threadpool, but is executed synchronously.
